title: Screen Company Type ID request
content:
Hi All,

Trying to sort out some graphics for my company, and no one seems to know what our own font is, let along have it on file anywhere, so I turn to you.

This is from our standard company logo.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090731144355im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_6305.jpg)

Its very similar to a font called Tachyon from Fonthead Design, but the middle bar in the “R” of Tacyhon is lower.

Any help would be very very much appriacted.

Best Regards

Neil
author: Distant2k

comments.content:
Riccard0, you are a legend. Can’t believe its the Terminator font, but it is :)

Many many thanks.

The original name of this font from predigital days is China. For a better-drawn alternative, check out [Changeling Neo](http://web.archive.org/web/20090731144355/http:/ms-studio.com/FontSales/changelingneo.html) by Mark Simonson.

- Lex
